fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, prevent someone from applying sunscreen the next day. The next day, they only require 50% of the majority of votes to hang. The next night, they have Vulnerable defense due to sunburn.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If someone dies from Vulnerable defense due to you, the death message will be due to sunburn instead of the standard heart attack.
